bug.short_desc: Wrong URL to file from folder history

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 4292 history page with bad urls
Scenario: - Browse to any directory and choose "History" - Click on one of the files - Expected: file content is shown - In fact result: empty page is shown - Reason: Url of the file link contains windows slashes. - Example: link to history: http://localhost:8080/searchDaletPlus/history/3.4/src/cpp/MediaServerPlus/MSPMachines/Drivers/PcxPlus/OfflineTest link to file: http://localhost:8080/searchDaletPlus/xref\3.4\src\cpp\Admin\UserFilterQuota\UserFilterQuota.vcproj?r=67868 Note: \ are represented are %5C iun the original URL
Environment: grok 9 - release tomcat 6 java 6 windows 2003
seems we need a cleanup on how URLs are generated I am seeing something similar in 16985
